name: UnlinkCustomerFromGiftCard
description:
Unlink a customer from a gift card.

This tool is used to unlink or remove a customer from a gift card. Call this tool when you need to detach a customer's association with a specific gift card, also known as removing a card on file.

parameters.name: gift_card_id_to_unlink
parameters.description: The ID of the gift card to be unlinked from the customer. Required for unlinking process.

value_schema.description: The ID of the gift card to be unlinked.

parameters.name: customer_id_to_unlink
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the customer to unlink from the gift card. Ensure it matches the correct customer.

value_schema.description: The ID of the customer to unlink from the gift card.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: gift_card_id
parameters.description: The ID of the gift card to be unlinked.

value_schema.description: The ID of the gift card to be unlinked.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to unlink from the gift card.

value_schema.description: The ID of the customer to unlink from the gift card.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
